name: Black Friday buy or die no regrets - A tribute to consumerism
name_original: Black Friday buy or die no regrets - A tribute to consumerism
description:
Black Friday buy or die no regrets - A tribute to consumerism is a game developed by Multihandicap, krispChip and Galaxy_Surfer. It came out on 24-02-2019.
You can play Black Friday buy or die no regrets - A tribute to consumerism on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
